Who should I cosplay as for halloween?  Koishi, Satori, Hata no Kokoro, Toyosatomimi no Miko, Mamizou, Amaterasu, maybe someone from digimon, Tamamo from fate/extra or just a modified ahri costume to keep it in line with dress code?
